mapper.insert: insert into t_whs_payment_log ( order_id, order_code, user_id, transaction_id, refund_fee, total_fee, bank_type, bank_name, payment_from, payment_step, payment_order_type, payment_time ) VALUES (#{orderId},#{orderCode},#{userId}, #{transactionId},#{refundFee},#{totalFee},#{bankType},#{bankName},#{paymentFrom},#{paymentStep}, #{paymentOrderType},#{paymentTime})
mapper.select: (select payment_time time,payment_step type,total_fee fee from t_whs_payment_log where user_id=#{userId} and payment_step in(1,5)) union all (select refund_time time,refund_type type,refund_fee fee from t_whs_refund_log where user_id=#{userId} and refund_type=1)
